name: oj-event
description: Makes namespaced eventlisteners possible on any DOM element. (on('click.nmsp', () => {}); off('click.nmsp');

scripts.build: tsc ./src/index.ts --lib esnext,dom --declaration true --outDir ./dist --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --target es5
scripts.share: npm upgrade && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --registry http://web01.oj.local:3000

author: Marius Linders @ Orange Juice<marius.linders@orange-juice.nl>
